mapper.select: select t.id "id", t.title "title", t.content "content", t.type "type", t.createdate "createdate" from t_systemlog t where 1=1 order by id desc limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from (select 1 from t_systemlog t where 1=1 ) a
mapper.insert: insert into t_systemlog ( id,createdate ,title ,content ,type ) values ( id,now() ,#{title} ,#{content} ,#{type} )
mapper.update: update t_systemlog set id=#{id} ,title=#{title} ,content=#{content} ,type=#{type} where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select t.id "id", t.title "title", t.content "content", t.type "type", t.createdate "createdate" from t_systemlog t where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from t_systemlog where 1=1 and id=#{id}
